item.title: How to Promote Yourself in Today‚Äôs Data Science Job Market
item.description: Tomorrow, I will be giving a talk on "How to Promote Yourself in Today's Data Science Job Market" at @oc_rug's 2nd #DataScience #hackathon. All of them are based on my personal experience of only looking for jobs in one city (Seattle) in the past year. https://t.co/UMj773UYLn pic.twitter.com/HdXhMe0o4k — Zhi Yang, PhD üéÑ‚ùÑÔ∏è (@zhiiiyang) November 9, 2019

item.title: How R Markdown helped me thrive in scientific research and advance my career development?
How R Markdown family automates the last mile of analytics
item.description: We're visiting our #rstats friends up in Santa Barbara! @zhiiiyang giving a talk on how R Markdown can automate the last mile of your work @RLadiesSB pic.twitter.com/WXzS7hhWv7 — Los Angeles R Users (@la_Rusers) September 19, 2019

item.title: R you ready to see awesome R Markdown?

item.title: Extracting topics from cancer patients' mutational profiles
E-cigarette product characteristics
item.description: Excited to present the research work with @Doctor_BT at #CPDD19 on the effect of e-cigarette use on past 30-day cigarette use among adolescents. Thank you all for dropping by and asking amazing questions. Also, I‚Äôd to share my experience of adopting #betterposter by @mikemorrison pic.twitter.com/N4zt7y6Kh9 ‚Äî Zhi Yang (@zhiiiyang) June 17, 2019
